definitions: The act of making a map or chart of an area.
The act of recording information in a chart or graph.
The act of planning a course of action.
The act of achieving a position on a music or sales chart.
examples: The ship's crew was busy charting the unknown waters.
Nurses are charting patient vital signs every hour.
The team is charting a new strategy for market expansion.
Their new single is charting well this week.
